[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@here/harp-text-canvas](./harp-text-canvas.md) &gt; [FontCatalog](./harp-text-canvas.fontcatalog.md)

## FontCatalog class

Collection of font assets used to render glyphs when using a \[\[TextCanvas\]\].

 A `FontCatalog` works as a stack of SDF bitmap fonts (using the BMFont format) designed to cover the widest Unicode code point range possible. In order to manage all these assets elegantly, the assets inside the `FontCatalog` are stored on a per-Unicode-Block basis, and assets for a block are only loaded once a glyph belonging to that block is requested.

Bitmap information coming from all different fonts is then stored in a unified WebGL GPU Texture resource, which can be sampled to render all currently loaded glyphs.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class FontCatalog 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [clear()](./harp-text-canvas.fontcatalog.clear.md) |  | Removes all loaded (and loading) assets. |
|  [dispose()](./harp-text-canvas.fontcatalog.dispose.md) |  | Release all allocated resources. |
|  [getFont(codePoint, fontName)](./harp-text-canvas.fontcatalog.getfont.md) |  | Gets the best matched font for a specific character. |
|  [getGlyph(codePoint, font, fontStyle)](./harp-text-canvas.fontcatalog.getglyph.md) |  | Retrieves the loaded \[\[GlyphData\]\] for a specific character. Returns <code>undefined</code> if the assets for this glyph haven't been loaded yet. |
|  [getGlyphs(input, style, letterCaseArray)](./harp-text-canvas.fontcatalog.getglyphs.md) |  | Retrieves the loaded \[\[GlyphData\]\] for the specified text. Returns <code>undefined</code> if the assets for these glyphs haven't been loaded yet. |
|  [load(path, maxCodePointCount)](./harp-text-canvas.fontcatalog.load.md) | <code>static</code> | Loads a <code>FontCatalog</code>. |
|  [loadBlock(block, font, fontStyle, loadPages)](./harp-text-canvas.fontcatalog.loadblock.md) |  | Loads the description file for a specific \[\[UnicodeBlock\]\]. This speeds up consequent calls to <code>FontCatalog</code>.loadCharset() that require glyphs from this block to be loaded. |
|  [loadCharset(input, style)](./harp-text-canvas.fontcatalog.loadcharset.md) |  | Loads all the required glyphs needed to render the input text. Character repetition will not be considered, and only styled assets (with applied font selection, style and variants) will be loaded. |
|  [loadJSON(url)](./harp-text-canvas.fontcatalog.loadjson.md) | <code>static</code> |  |
|  [loadTexture(url)](./harp-text-canvas.fontcatalog.loadtexture.md) | <code>static</code> |  |
|  [removeBlock(block, font, fontStyle)](./harp-text-canvas.fontcatalog.removeblock.md) |  | Releases the description file for a specific \[\[UnicodeBlock\]\] (and all downloaded pages). Safe to call when no assets for this block have been loaded. |
|  [update(renderer)](./harp-text-canvas.fontcatalog.update.md) |  | Updates the internal WebGLRenderTarget. The update will copy the newly introduced glyphs since the previous update. |
|  [updateMemoryUsage(info)](./harp-text-canvas.fontcatalog.updatememoryusage.md) |  | Update the info with the memory footprint caused by objects owned by the <code>FontCatalog</code>. |
